title: Assign a Crew to a Train
description: A train is scheduled to depart. A crew dispatcher needs to assign a qualified and rested crew to operate it.

tasks.description: Select the train that needs a crew assignment.
View the list of available crews, showing their qualifications and rest status.
tasks.expected_outcome: A list of rested and available crews is displayed.

tasks.description: Select a crew that is qualified for the specific route and has sufficient rest.
tasks.expected_outcome: Dispatcher makes a compliant crew choice.

tasks.description: Assign the selected crew to the train and notify them of their assignment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The crew is assigned, and they receive a notification with the report time and location.
